mapper.sql: single_id, single_content, choice_A, choice_B, choice_C, choice_D, choice_E, choice_F, choice_G, single_answer, compose_flag, answer_explain, lang_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bank_single_choice_que
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT q.que_id,q.que_type,s.single_id,s.single_content,s.choice_A,s.choice_B,s.choice_C,s.choice_D,s.choice_E,s.choice_F,s.choice_G,s.single_answer,s.compose_flag,s.answer_explain,s.lang_id FROM paper_que q,bank_single_choice_que s WHERE paper_id=#{paperId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND q.single_id=s.single_id
SELECT * FROM bank_single_choice_que WHERE lang_id=#{langId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{singleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into bank_single_choice_que (single_id, single_content, choice_A, choice_B, choice_C, choice_D, choice_E, choice_F, choice_G, single_answer, compose_flag, answer_explain, lang_id) values (#{singleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceF,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{singleAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{composeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{langId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into bank_single_choice_que
single_id,
single_content,
choice_A,
choice_B,
choice_C,
choice_D,
choice_E,
choice_F,
choice_G,
single_answer,
compose_flag,
answer_explain,
lang_id,

mapper.update:
update bank_single_choice_que
single_id = #{record.singleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
single_content = #{record.singleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_A = #{record.choiceA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_B = #{record.choiceB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_C = #{record.choiceC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_D = #{record.choiceD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_E = #{record.choiceE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_F = #{record.choiceF,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_G = #{record.choiceG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
single_answer = #{record.singleAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
compose_flag = #{record.composeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer_explain = #{record.answerExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lang_id = #{record.langId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update bank_single_choice_que set single_id = #{record.singleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, single_content = #{record.singleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_A = #{record.choiceA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_B = #{record.choiceB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_C = #{record.choiceC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_D = #{record.choiceD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_E = #{record.choiceE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_F = #{record.choiceF,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_G = #{record.choiceG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, single_answer = #{record.singleAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, compose_flag = #{record.composeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer_explain = #{record.answerExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lang_id = #{record.langId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bank_single_choice_que
single_content = #{singleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_A = #{choiceA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_B = #{choiceB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_C = #{choiceC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_D = #{choiceD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_E = #{choiceE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_F = #{choiceF,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_G = #{choiceG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
single_answer = #{singleAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
compose_flag = #{composeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer_explain = #{answerExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lang_id = #{langId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where single_id = #{singleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bank_single_choice_que set single_content = #{singleContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_A = #{choiceA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_B = #{choiceB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_C = #{choiceC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_D = #{choiceD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_E = #{choiceE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_F = #{choiceF,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_G = #{choiceG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, single_answer = #{singleAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, compose_flag = #{composeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer_explain = #{answerExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lang_id = #{langId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where single_id = #{singleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
